title: Database MCP Server
description: Connect to various databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite) and execute queries through MCP.
author: Database Team
usage:
To use this MCP server configuration:

1. Copy the configuration above
2. Add it to your MCP client configuration file
3. Set your database connection URL
4. Restart your MCP client to load the new server
5. The server will be available for database operations in your AI workflows
